org.jooq
Interface QueryPart

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
FalseCondition, ParameterImpl, SchemaImpl, StoredFunctionImpl, StoredProcedureImpl, TableFieldImpl, TableImpl, TrueCondition, UDTFieldImpl, UDTImpl, UpdatableTableImpl
public interface QueryPart
extends java.io.Serializable

Base functionality declaration for all query objects

This interface is for JOOQ INTERNAL USE only. Do not reference directly

Author:
Lukas Eder

Method Detail

toSQLReference

java.lang.String toSQLReference(Configuration configuration)
Transform this object into SQL, such that it can be used as a reference. This always results in calling #toSQLReference(false)

This method is for JOOQ INTERNAL USE only. Do not reference directly

Parameters:
configuration - The configuration overriding dialects and schemata
Returns:
SQL representation of this QueryPart
See Also:
#toSQLReference(boolean)}

toSQLReference

java.lang.String toSQLReference(Configuration configuration,
                                boolean inlineParameters)
Transform this object into SQL, such that it can be used as a reference.

This method is for JOOQ INTERNAL USE only. Do not reference directly

Parameters:
configuration - The configuration overriding dialects and schemata
inlineParameters - if set to true, all parameters are inlined, not replaced by "?"
Returns:
SQL representation of this QueryPart

toSQLDeclaration

java.lang.String toSQLDeclaration(Configuration configuration)
Transform this object into SQL, such that it can be used as a declaration. Usually, this is the same as calling toSQLReference(). This always results in calling #toSQLDeclaration(false)

This method is for JOOQ INTERNAL USE only. Do not reference directly

Parameters:
configuration - The configuration overriding dialects and schemata
Returns:
SQL representation of this QueryPart
See Also:
#toSQLReference(boolean)}

toSQLDeclaration

java.lang.String toSQLDeclaration(Configuration configuration,
                                  boolean inlineParameters)
Transform this object into SQL, such that it can be used as a declaration. Usually, this is the same as calling toSQLReference(boolean)

This method is for JOOQ INTERNAL USE only. Do not reference directly

Parameters:
configuration - The configuration overriding dialects and schemata
inlineParameters - if set to true, all parameters are inlined, not replaced by "?"
Returns:
SQL representation of this QueryPart

bind

int bind(Configuration configuration,
         java.sql.PreparedStatement stmt)
         throws java.sql.SQLException
Bind all parameters of this QueryPart to a PreparedStatement. This always results in calling #bind(stmt, 1)

This method is for JOOQ INTERNAL USE only. Do not reference directly

Parameters:
configuration - The configuration overriding dialects and schemata
stmt - The statement to bind values to
Returns:
The index of the next binding variable
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
See Also:
{@link #bind(PreparedStatement, int)}

bind

         java.sql.PreparedStatement stmt,
         int initialIndex)
         throws java.sql.SQLException
Bind all parameters of this QueryPart to a PreparedStatement.

This method is for JOOQ INTERNAL USE only. Do not reference directly

Parameters:
configuration - The configuration overriding dialects and schemata
stmt - The statement to bind values to
initialIndex - The index of the next binding variable
Returns:
The index of the next binding variable
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
